short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize colors of GitHub project tickets based on repository.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitHub Project Card Color Customizer is a Chrome extension that allows users to customize the background colors of project cards on GitHub project boards. This tool is particularly useful for visually organizing project cards based on different repositories.
